name: Bonds of Cards
description:
Go fullscreen for the best experience! Also note that quitting in browser mode will crash the game!

Bonds of Cards is a game that mixes up the Visual Novel genre with characteristics seen in Card Games.

Commands:

P or ESC to open Pause Menu.

Mouse left click on dialogue box to progress with dialogue during Visual Novel scene

Mouse left click to select cards during Conversations (card battles), click Help during Deckbuilding and Battle for more information.
